item.description:
The Bicycle Coalition of Maine's annual pizza party will take place on June 21 from 5 to 9 p.m. at Flatbread Pizza Co., 72 Commercial St., Portland. This popular event includes the unbeatable combination of pizza, beer and bicyclists. Flatbread will donate a portion of the proceeds from every pizza sold during the evening (including takeout orders) to the coalition. Shipyard Brewing Co. will donate $1 for every beer sold. Come eat, drink, socialize with other cyclists and help support the coalition's work to improve bicycling in Maine. For more information, please call (207) 623-4511.

RSVP to reserve a table with us!
item.name: Eat Pizza for the Bicycle Coalition of Maine
